grouped-region.name: National: Grouped by Regions (Recommended)
grouped-region.description: (Recommended) Boxes will be organized grouped by the Species and Forms discovered on every region, with the species placed before all the region's forms. This is the default one for HOME, since it does not shift or alter the order of other Pokémon whenever a new form or species are introduced.

species-first.name: National: Grouped by Species, then Forms
species-first.description: Grouped with the Species first and the Forms after all of them, grouped by generation and categories. You may need to alter the order of your form boxes if there are a lot of species introduced in a new game. This mode also adds many duplicated Pokémon, to visualize all the forms together, including the base form.

sorted-species.name: National: Sorted by Species
sorted-species.description: (Recommended) Pokémon Boxes are sorted following HOME's National Dex order, separating Species and Forms. First you will find all the species, then all the forms starting in a new box (leaving a gap with the species).

sorted-species-minimal.name: National: Sorted by Species (Minimal)
sorted-species-minimal.description: Pokémon Boxes are sorted following HOME's National Dex order separating Species and Forms, but Legendary or Mythical Pokémon forms (like Magearna Original Color, etc) will be excluded. First you will find all the species, then all the forms starting in a new box (leaving a gap with the species).

fully-sorted.name: National: Sorted by Forms
fully-sorted.description: Pokémon Boxes are sorted following HOME's National Dex order, mixing Species and Forms together.

fully-sorted-minimal.name: National: Sorted by Forms (Minimal)
fully-sorted-minimal.description: Pokémon Boxes are sorted following HOME's National Dex order mixing Species and Forms, but Legendary or Mythical Pokémon forms (like Hoopa Unbound, etc) will be excluded.

sorted-species.name: National: Sorted by Species
sorted-species.description: (Recommended) Pokémon Boxes are sorted following HOME's National Dex order, separating Species and Forms. First you will find all the species, then all the forms starting in a new box (leaving a gap with the species).

fully-sorted-paldea.name: (LEGACY) Regional: Sorted by Forms
fully-sorted-paldea.description: (Recommended) Pokémon Boxes are sorted by Species and Forms together, following regional Pokédex order. This also includes Pokémon that are only available via HOME transfer.

minimal-paldea.name: Regional: Sorted by Forms (Minimal)
minimal-paldea.description: Pokémon Boxes are sorted by Species and Forms together, following regional Pokédex order. Cosmetic forms and HOME transfer-only Pokémon are excluded.

fully-grouped-paldea.name: Regional: Grouped by Species, then Forms
fully-grouped-paldea.description: Pokémon Boxes are grouped by Species and then Forms, following regional Pokédex order.

sorted-species.name: (LEGACY) National: Sorted by Species

fully-sorted-minimal.name: Regional: Sorted by Forms, Minimal
fully-sorted-minimal.description: Pokémon Boxes are sorted by Species and Forms together (except legendary forms), following original Legends: Arceus Pokédex order.

sorted-species.name: Regional: Sorted by Species, then forms
sorted-species.description: Pokémon Boxes are grouped separating Species and Forms. First you will find all the species, then all the forms (leaving a gap with the species).

grouped.name: Regional: Sorted by Species, then form groups
grouped.description: Pokémon Boxes are grouped separating Species and Forms. First you will find all the species, then all the forms by groups (leaving gaps among different form categories).

fully-sorted.name: Regional: Sorted by Forms
fully-sorted.description: (Recommended) Pokémon Boxes are sorted by Species and Forms together, following original Legends: Arceus Pokédex order.

fully-sorted-hisui.name: Regional: Sorted by Forms
fully-sorted-hisui.description: (Recommended) Pokémon Boxes are sorted by Species and Forms together, following regional Pokédex order. This also includes Pokémon that are only available via HOME transfer.

minimal-hisui.name: Regional: Sorted by Forms (Minimal)
minimal-hisui.description: Pokémon Boxes are sorted by Species and Forms together, following regional Pokédex order. Cosmetic forms and HOME transfer-only Pokémon are excluded.

fully-sorted-regional.name: Regional: Sorted by Forms
fully-sorted-regional.description: Pokémon Boxes are sorted by Species and Forms together. Pokémon are sorted following each different Galar Pokedexes keeping only non-duplicates entries from DLCs.

sorted-regional.name: Regional: Sorted by Species
sorted-regional.description: Pokémon Boxes are sorted following each different Galar Pokedexes keeping only non-duplicates entries, separating Species and Forms. First you will find all the species, then all the forms starting in a new box (leaving a gap with the species). Forms are then sorted in the following order: Regional forms, Female forms and cosmetic forms
